Which bird had the most individual sightings?

```{r}
bird_most_sightings <- bird_ship_data %>%
  
  group_by(bird_common_name,bird_scientific_name,bird_abbreviation) %>%
  
  arrange(desc(count))

  
bird_most_sightings


 
```
